meanings.definition: Work assigned to be done as a task.
meanings.sent1: Completing the taskwork on time is important for good grades.
meanings.sent2: She diligently tackled her taskwork every day.
meanings.sent3: The taskwork of organizing her room turned into a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her taskwork was a mountain she had to climb before the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The taskwork of painting the fence felt like a never-ending journey.

meanings.sent1: His taskwork involved cleaning the classroom after school.
meanings.sent2: The team's taskwork was to finish the project by Friday.
meanings.sent3: The taskwork of feeding the class pet became a daily routine.
meanings.sent4: Her taskwork in the garden was like a dance of productivity.
meanings.sent5: The taskwork of setting up the event made her feel accomplished.
